abilities.name: Harbinger of Despair
abilities.rule: Once per turn, at the start of your Command, Movement, Shooting, Charge or Fight phase, you can select one enemy unit within 18" of this model. That unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the test when it does so.

abilities.name: Nightmare Shroud
abilities.rule: In the Battle-shock step of your opponent’s Command phase, if an enemy unit that is below its Starting Strength is within 6" of this model, that enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the test when it does so.

unit_composition:

**This model is equipped with:** abyssal lance.
